item.description:
Hi Aussies,

For all those who are in Boston for the holiday, let's celebrate the night before with a few games of pool/bowling/air hockey and a beer. The venue is Kings, there are plenty of lanes and pool tables and a couple of bars so we should be all set. We will be observing NSW pool rules exclusively during the evening.

Cheers,

Andrew
item.how_to_find_us: Lets meet at the bar in the pool table area

group.name: The Boston Expat Aussie Meetup Group

item.name: Thanksgiving Eve Meetup
